agents.name: Claude Code
agents.description: Anthropic's agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands codebases, handles git workflows and multi-file editing through natural language.

agents.name: Aider
agents.description: AI pair programming tool that runs in your terminal, directly edits code in local git repositories with sensible commit messages.

agents.name: Gemini CLI
agents.description: Google's open-source AI agent bringing Gemini directly into terminal for coding, problem-solving, and task management with file manipulation.

agents.name: GitHub Copilot CLI
agents.description: Brings GitHub Copilot directly to your command line for intelligent code assistance, debugging, and GitHub repository interactions.

agents.name: Goose
agents.description: Open-source extensible AI agent from Block that goes beyond code suggestions - builds projects, debugs, orchestrates complex coding workflows.

agents.name: Continue
agents.description: Open-source coding agent with TUI mode for interactive development and headless mode for background automation tasks.

agents.name: Cursor CLI
agents.description: Command-line version of Cursor AI editor, enables AI coding workflows to run from terminal without GUI.

agents.name: Mentat
agents.description: AI coding assistant that coordinates edits across multiple files from command line with automatic context awareness via RAG.

agents.name: Cody CLI
agents.description: Command-line version of Sourcegraph's Cody AI assistant with deep code graph integration for enhanced context.

agents.name: Sweep AI
agents.description: AI junior developer that transforms bug reports and feature requests into code changes and automatically generates pull requests.

agents.name: GPT Engineer
agents.description: CLI platform for code generation from text prompts, generates complete functional codebases in any programming language.

agents.name: Qodo Command
agents.description: CLI for building, managing and running AI agents for SDLC automation, testing, and code review tasks.

agents.name: OpenCode
agents.description: AI coding assistant built in Go with terminal user interface for efficient terminal-based development tasks.

agents.name: Open Interpreter
agents.description: Natural language interface that lets LLMs execute code locally with full system access for practical file and task manipulation.

metadata.description: A curated list of CLI coding agents - AI tools that understand code and can make edits, generate files, and manage coding workflows from the terminal.
